entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fold Guid parsing pattern in JIT #85879
    Future
  • Dotnet failed to run after publishing on debian with the error below #85878
  • JIT: Block morphing does not handle that decomposed writes can affect the destination #85874
  • [MSVC] CoreCLR failed to build due to error C2280 and C2088 with option /std:c++20 #85864
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #85863
  • how to hotload dotnet assembly in coreclr? #85862
  • JIT: more unexpected dynamic PGO schema mismatches #85856
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ILCompiler: Unable to cast object of type 'Internal.TypeSystem.SignatureTypeVariable' to type 'Internal.TypeSystem.DefType'. #85865
  • RyuJIT bounds checks not eliminated for readonly arrays #11797
    Future
  • JIT: better optimization for CORINFO_HELP_RUNTIMEHANDLE_METHOD #7590
    Future
  • Regressions in System.IO.Compression.Brotli #79410
    Future
  • Do we still need [AggressiveOptimization] on so many methods? #71261
    8.0.0
  • TE startup/time-to-first-request regression #84923
  • [API Proposal]: File.DeleteAsync(path) #85834
  • [API Proposal]: Directory.GetDirectories / Directory.GetFiles IAsyncEnumerable #85835
  • Segregate the register iterations based on intType/floatType #83109
    8.0.0
  • How to accept a client certificate signed by an untrusted CA in .netcore 3.1 #85767

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove check from FillStringChecked and rename it to CopyStringContent #85880
    needs-area-label
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixed link to PR guide in CONTRIBUTING.md #85876
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix another case of early flow graph divergence #85873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before global morph #85872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure the insTupleType mask entries stay correct #85870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Unsafe.BitCast in AnyNSearchValues<T, TImpl> types #85868
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Use string.IsNullOrEmpty and ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty in many more places #85858
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [main] Servicing docs improvements #85855
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Save some space in the hwintrinsic and instruction tables #85853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure `maxSIMDStructBytes` doesn't report `compVerifyInstructionSetUnusable` #85370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address `TODO-FIELD`s and delete quirks #85735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: produce consistent flow graph when producing or consuming profile data #85860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace GetInternalValue methods on RuntimeHandles with public equivalents #85861
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip FP registers processing if method don't have floating points use #85744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Servicing docs improvements #85731
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose various integer intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512CD #85833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Constant folding for SIMD comparisons #85584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove static modifiers from ThreadPool events in NativeRuntimeEventSource.PortableThreadPool.NativeSinks.cs #85563
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT/SIMD to a merged test group #85852
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Performance to a merged test group #85851
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/opt to a merged test group #85850
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Generics to a merged test group #85849
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Skip ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle if COM interop is not supported #85813
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use Vector128 and Vector256 in interface cast #83000
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - Override KnownWebAssemblySdkPack to 8.0.0-dev #85815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • We should not establish a heap hard limit for 32 bit platforms #85844
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update mariner images to latest with LLVM 16 #84676
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
